籤詩版本二:
Ikhowuni yengca icela umthombo, kuba kunzima ukufuna umsebenzi onzima.
Ngamanye amaxesha, ngokukhawuleza ndidibana nomhlobo wam osenyongweni kwaye ndiye esibhakabhakeni ngesandla.
詩意:
Lo mhlaba we-hexagram cone ufuna umfanekiso wentwasahlobo.
Yonke into inzima ngaphambi kokuba ibe lula kamva.
解曰: Iminqweno kunye neengcinga. INtshona iyafumaneka. Kungcono ungahambi. Kukho indawo yokufumana.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULiu Chen udibana nomntu ongafiyo
KwiMpuma yeHan Dynasty, uLiu Chen kunye noRuan Zhaoguo baya ezintabeni ukuya kuqokelela imifuno kwaye badibana neefairies ezimbini.
Aba babini batshata nedlozi baza babuyela ekhaya emva kwesiqingatha sonyaka, babengazi ukuba kwakusele kudlule iminyaka elikhulu babuyela ekhaya.
Akwabakho mntu ubaziyo, ngoko babuyela ezintabeni, bekhangela intsomi leyo, abayifumana.
聖意: Thandazela iintsikelelo kwikhaya lakho kunye nekhaya lakho, inzuzo yakho yemali, ukuthengiselana, umtshato, ukhuseleko eLiujia, abantu baseChitian, ukutyalwa kwe-silkworms kwangoko, ukonakaliswa kwemfuyo, ukufumana abantu, kuluntu. Isimangalo, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekileyo, izifo, ithamsanqa kumangcwaba eNtaba yeXingxing,
